'''1.6.11'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360008726691|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.6|date=July 24, 2018}}</ref> is an update for the {{el|ds}} released on July 24–25, 2018, which added new DLC packs to the store.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* New DLC available for purchase:
** Candy Texture Pack
** [[Battle & Beasts Skin Pack]]
** [[Star Wars Classic Skin Pack]]
** [[Star Wars Rebels Skin Pack]]

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Improved stability and performance.

== Fixes ==
* Several bug fixes from previous versions.
